Title: OnePlus makes its shift from Hasselblad official, debuts DetailMax Engine
Description: OnePlus CEO officially confirmed that the company will depart from Hasselblad in favor of a new, in-house imaging engine.

Title: Opinion: Susan Stamberg, trailblazer and NPR Founding Mother, retires
Description:
NPR Founding Mother Susan Stamberg is retiring.
She became the first woman to anchor a nightly national news program in 1972, and helped loosen up the serious, stodgy sound of radio hosts.

Title: Amid debate about U.S. history, Harlem Hellfighters receive Congressional Gold Medal
Description: The Harlem Hellfighters, who became legends for their service during World War I, were honored this week with a Congressional Gold Medal.

Title: Alcaraz beats Djokovic at the U.S. Open and will meet Sinner for Grand Slam final
Description:
Sinner is trying to become the first repeat men's champion in New York since Roger Federer won the tournament five years in a row.

Open title.
